input_args.passage: 'Cerdic of Wessex | Cerdic was the Saxon leader defeated by the Britons at the Battle of Mount Badon, probably fought in 490 (and possibly later, but not later than ...'
input_args.claim: 'Therefore, although the sources do not directly state which army was defeated by the West Saxon forces led by Cerdic and Cynric of the Gewisse, it can be inferred from the information available that it was the Britons.'
